data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_86c9f91f530727db6498f920d19180d1.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
When Alpha uses a skill, Beta will be summoned to attack. Enemies that are hit by Beta 2 time(s) will be <font color="a6aafb">Locked On</font>.

<font color="a6aafb">Locked On</font>: After Alpha deals damage to the target, Beta will fire a laser at them, dealing 80<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">(+8*Hero Level)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> and briefly applying a powerful slow effect.

Alpha unleashes an energy wave in the target direction, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+90% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in its path and slowing them by 40% for 1s.

Beta then strafes enemies along the same path, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font>.

After a short delay, Alpha swings his blade in the target direction, dealing 180<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area and restoring 40<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> HP for each enemy hit.

Beta then strafes enemies in the same area, dealing 60<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font>.

Beta dives to the target location, dealing 100<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and stunning them for 1s. Alpha then leaps towards the same location, knocking enemies in his path airborne and carrying them to the landing location. Alpha then slams down, dealing 250<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and slowing the enemies by 40% for 1.5s.

Beta then attacks the same area 5 times, dealing 15<font color="fba51f"> (+30% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> each time.

data.name: Alpha

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Grows in power as fights go on. Can take and dish out damage.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+10% Spell Vamp
+22 Adaptive Attack
+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Physical Defense

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskill2: Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+10% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+10% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

recommendmasterplan.name: SENSEY
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: A pure cyborg made by Laboratory 1718.

assist.desc: Alpha works well with heroes that can initiate with CC like Vexana and Selena. With their help, he'll have a much easier time landing his skills.

strong.desc: Alpha counters heroes that lack mobility, such as Layla and Ixia, because these heroes have a hard time avoiding his skills.

weak.desc: Alpha is countered by heroes that are very mobile, such as Chou and Gusion, because they have a lot of ways to dodge Alpha's skills.
